data.message: Hi facebook so recenlty 1 of my friends got banned cause someone reported him because he had a fake lastname i mean this is a joke i have a fake one too there many people on fb without there real last names i want to ask how can he get he's account back he already tryed but he got no respone back when he trys to connect to he's fb account he gets this message we couldn't Verify your name so what is he suposed to do now how can he get it back ?

replies.message: Hey there. Our real-name policy is intended to help create a more personal experience, and we’re improving the way that the policy is implemented. If you or a friend believes that an account has been suspended by mistake, you can submit an appeal. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2efi7hI. -Nick
